properties.NAME: Cosmic Caverns
properties.DESCRIPTION: 1 hour & 15 minute walking tour, the warmest cave in the Ozark's at 64 degrees year round

properties.NAME: Onyx Cave
properties.DESCRIPTION: Located six miles east of Eureka Springs, radio headphones guide you on a non-strenuous path through the cave as you pass amazing formations.

properties.NAME: Mystic Caverns
properties.DESCRIPTION: Located 8 miles south of Harrison in Marble Falls, offers guided tours of beautiful caverns, Mystic and Crystal Dome.

properties.NAME: Old Spanish Treasure Cave
properties.DESCRIPTION: Located near Sulphur Springs, offers a guided tour that includes fossils, and provides an Adventure Tour for beginning cavers.

properties.NAME: War Eagle Cavern
properties.DESCRIPTION: Offers 40-minute tour, and gemstone panning this site is highly protected and every effort has been made to leave the caverns and ground in their natural state.

properties.NAME: Blanchard Springs Caverns
properties.DESCRIPTION: Located in Mountain View, and operated by the U.S. Forest Service, they offer 2 guided tours that trail through massive ever-changing formations.

properties.NAME: Bull Shoals Caverns
properties.DESCRIPTION: Located in Bull Shoals, offers 45-50 minute tours through amazing caverns that formed 350 million years ago.

properties.NAME: Hurricane River Cave
properties.DESCRIPTION: Located near Harrison they offer both regular and wild cave tours through huge formations and down an ancient underground riverbed.
